content.1: And he shewed me Joshua the high priest standing before the angel of the
content.3: Now Joshua was clothed with filthy garments, and stood before the angel.
content.4: And he answered and spake unto those that stood before him, saying, Take away the filthy garments from him. And unto him he said, Behold, I have caused thine iniquity to pass from thee, and I will clothe thee with change of raiment.
content.5: And I said, Let them set a fair mitre upon his head. So they set a fair mitre upon his head, and clothed him with garments. And the angel of the
content.8: Hear now, O Joshua the high priest, thou, and thy fellows that sit before thee: for they
content.9: For behold the stone that I have laid before Joshua; upon one stone
